code_id._description: An internal identifier for the code.  It must be unique across all codes on the error correction zoo.

name._description: The name of the code.  It is listed in multiple places, so don't make it too long.

description._description: Describe code subspace as best as you can here.  Anything applicable to a larger parent set of codes (see below) should go in that entry instead of here.

introduced._description: First reference with the code (optional).  This field should be a single ‘\cite{}’ command with the appropriate reference(s).  Recall that you can cite multiple references with a single ‘\cite’ command, separating keys with commas.
